markdownRemark.excerpt: Do you know how to send an SOS in morse code? Do you know your birthstone? Or the winners of the Oscars since 1927 ? MIStupid.com has an assortment of trivia and topics not known by the most of us. As a bonus they have categories with games and puzzles you can play with when you catch a bit of an information overload.
markdownRemark.html:
Do you know how to send an SOS in morse code? Do you know your birthstone? Or the winners of the Oscars since 1927 ? MIStupid.com has an assortment of trivia and topics not known by the most of us. As a bonus they have categories with games and puzzles you can play with when you catch a bit of an information overload.

http://mistupid.com/contents.htm

No matter how trivial or uninteresting the fact is MIStupid.com will surely have it, otherwise go back to Google (hehehe). Well okay itâ€™s not Encarta but its free and GREEN ðŸ™‚
